title: Was This All-AMD Notebook The Best of CES?
description: The ASUS TUF FX505 may be the best notebook we saw at CES 2019 but not because of crazy specs or insane design.  Rather this gaming notebook uses a Ryzen 3550H and RX 560X while costing just $800.    Thanks to all of our sponsors: Thermaltake MSI Corsair Phanteks Razer  As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Main 4K Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second 4K Camera -  $700 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #ces2019 #asus #hardwarecanucks
